@graph.name: Cauliflower Spinach and Chickpeas with Mustard Seed Curry Leaf Sauce - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This easy cauliflower chickpea and spinach saute features a fragrant Mustard & Curry Leaf Sauce - an easy vegan meal that is ready in under 45 minutes

itemListElement.name: Cauliflower Spinach and Chickpeas with Mustard Seed Curry Leaf Sauce

@graph.name: Cauliflower Chickpeas and Spinach in Mustard seed Curry Leaf Sauce
@graph.description: This easy cauliflower chickpea and spinach saute features a fragrant Mustard Seed & Curry Leaf Sauce - an easy vegan meal that is ready in 30  minutes. Packed with healthy cauliflower, creamy chickpeas, and super food spinach in every bite
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp Urad dal (,split black gram , or use moong dal)
1  small head cauliflower (chopped into small florets)
1 cup chopped tomato or 1 large tomato, chopped small
15 oz can chickpeas (drained or 1 1/4  cup cooked chickpeas)
1 tsp sambhar  masala ( or use 1 tsp ground coriander +1/8 tsp cayenne)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat large skillet over medium heat, add oil and wait until hot. (You want the oil to be pretty hot else seeds won’t pop). Add the mustard seeds wait for them to pop.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat large skillet over medium heat, add oil and wait until hot. (You want the oil to be pretty hot else seeds won’t pop). Add the mustard seeds wait for them to pop.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Urad dal lentils and cook until golden, then carefully add curry leaves and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the Urad dal lentils and cook until golden, then carefully add curry leaves and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic, and mix again quickly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic, and mix again quickly.

recipeInstructions.text: Put the cauliflower in the pan and toss making sure it's well coated, then let cauliflower cook 4-5 minutes uncovered until partially browned
recipeInstructions.name: Put the cauliflower in the pan and toss making sure it's well coated, then let cauliflower cook 4-5 minutes uncovered until partially browned

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and 1/2 cup water mix well, then cover and cook 6-8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes and 1/2 cup water mix well, then cover and cook 6-8 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the spinach, chickpeas,  sambhar masala, salt and remaining 1/2 cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the spinach, chickpeas,  sambhar masala, salt and remaining 1/2 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well and let cook for another 6-8 minutes, stirring once in between, until the cauliflower is cooked to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well and let cook for another 6-8 minutes, stirring once in between, until the cauliflower is cooked to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pepper flakes to taste for heat (if needed) and garnish with cilantro (optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the pepper flakes to taste for heat (if needed) and garnish with cilantro (optional)

@graph.keywords: chickpea saute, chickpeas and cauliflower, chickpeas and spinach
